data.text:
Banned

OVR: 0

Join Date: Mar 2012

Location: Silver Grove, Kentucky

Posts: 0

NBA 2K14 "Rep Your Team" Roster!

Well, while I am waiting on NBA 2K15 to drop, I decided to throw this bad boy together to have some fun. It looks like a blast so far and I have played some simple games that have been incredible.

To summarize this very quickly, this roster will be completely re-arranged with current stars and legends alike! The premise is to put players on teams that represent their city/country! example: Players from (or near) Chicago will play for the bulls. However, I did throw in 6 special teams. Including 4 European Teams, and a team composed entirely of former DUKE players! Sorry, Nuggets fans, but Seattle will be taking your teams place if you decide to take my roster into season mode. I know I will be!

I'll leave the team list here for anyone to check out, and just a heads up, this is ONLY a roster re-arrange, no ratings, tendencies or anything crazy was edited. Thanks! Let me know what you think!

I placed players on their respective teams based on 3 criterian.

1st Reputation (Carmelo played and grew up in Virginia and Baltimore in HS, however its obvious to everyone that he was born and is from New York. Therefor he is a Knick.

2nd Where they played in HS (Sometimes this isn't enough, as players moved to more prestigious programs, just like Carmelo, So I took that into account.

3rd Where they were born (This is the final step I take If I go through steps 1 and 2 and still cannot determine. If this one also throws me through loops I make a personal determination of what team they should play on.)

****I AM NOT GOING TO BE PERFECT. IF I GET A PLAYERS TEAM WRONG, JUST LET ME KNOW! Thanks!

(08-23-14) GAMERTAG: JA MONEY14

FILE NAME: rep

I'll change the name later, but it's 4:30 AM and I am so tired.. lol.

Now for the ROSTERS!!
